Name: Skip's Sanity
About the game: Play 5 second micro games to unlock mini games. Beat mini games to unlock even more! Games range from simple to complex. Some games challenge your reflexes where others test the limits of your mind. There's something for everyone. Over 50 games included All games are 'one button' (other than joystick / direction keys) Beat high scores to unlock fun toys Retro style graphics Toys offer a longer, more relaxed gameplay style Skip's sanity is on the line. Can you beat an arcade shooter, an action RPG, a platformer, puzzle games, and more?
